brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts networks connected via a Switched Virtual Circuit (SVC) and via a Permanent Virtual Circuit (PVC).
An enterprise network connects via a CSU/DSU to another enterprise network that also uses a CSU/DSU.. Between the two networks is a network cloud. The connection through the network is an SVC. An SVC is built up and torn down as required.

An enterprise network connects via a CSU/DSU to another enterprise network that also uses a CSU/DSU. Between the two networks is a network cloud. The connection through the network is a PVC. PVC is configured by the network administrator and loaded at switch startup.
